�� JMemoryPool.Block

  • �����:
    JMemoryPool

    public static class JMemoryPool.Block
extends JMemory
    A block of native memory allocated with malloc. This block is further sub allocated on a per request basis using the method allocate(int).
    ����:
    Sly Technologies, Inc.
